  • testing testing 1, 2, 3 (29 Nov 2013)

This project to print pixels on thread is by Crystal Beasley a.k.a. @skinny. I have a lifelong fascination with behavior and ritual, especially those where the participants reach some trance-like state. I experienced this firsthand in the form of speaking in tongues as a member of a fundamentalist church in the American South. These images capture a moment of transcendence.

I to hear from you:
